alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 3:18PM MDT until May 16 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Broadwater County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Meagher County in central Montana... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 317 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Townsend or 8 miles west of Deep Creek Pass, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Deep Creek PAss, Lennep and Ringling. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
